page.title: 08CLOTHES WORN BY FLEET PUPILS
page.content: For{school}most pupils wear a uniform. At{Heatherside}the boys wear purple jumpers, the girls wear purple dresses.{Courtmoor}boys wear grey jumpers, the girls wear red. {Out of school}children choose what to wear. Most girls like to be{fashionable. } Three quarter length trousers and small heeled shoes are quite popular and so are batwing jumpers.Pixie-boots and tight jeans are very often worn. Girls want to be pretty and often wear jewellery and make-up if they are older.This year floral dresses and blouses are the latest fashion. Boys like jeans and tee-shirts. Some wear florescent socks but white are more popular. Training shoes are favourites but also pointed-toe shoes. A new fashion for boys is break-dance boots.
